title: Econ Liberalization in China and Iran

content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question:

Using the data in the graph, describe the GDP growth rate in Iran in 2011.

Using the data in the graph, describe a trend for China between 1991 and 2015.

Describe what economic liberalization means.

Using the data in the graph, explain how economic growth in Iran was affected by international organizations.

Explain an implication of economic growth in China for policy making by the government.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
